price: Cuando su Señor lo llamó en el valle sagrado de Tuwa
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
footnotes: en el valle sagrado de Tuwa: Ver Corán 20:112.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
